attributes.action: insist that all employed persons have their gross wages or salary paid directly to the Chancellor of the Exchequer and be forced to justify to him any requirement for pocket money that they may have to cover food, fuel and mortgage etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown is taking an increasing slice of our wages year on year. We should therefore save him having to justify new means of taking our money and save him the cost of collecting PAYE, VAT, Fuel Excise Duty etc it via HMRC and other Agencies by having our salary paid directly to the Exchequer and then being required to justify why we want any of it back to live on.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
